item.title: Skills
item.description:
DEVELOPMENT SKILLS
Skill Level
Languages :
Python, Groovy, C#, Kotlin, JavaScript/TypeScript, PHP, Java 		Expert
Frameworks :
Grails, Micronaut, Flask, ASP Core/MVC, Django, Leaf PHP, Laravel/Lumen, Spring Boot, Node JS 		Expert
FrontEnd Tools:
HTML5, Bootstrap, JQuery, Svelt 		Advanced
Mobile Frameworks:
Framework 7 (Svelt), Svelt Native, React Native, Android SDK 		Advanced
CMS & Documentation :
Grav, Hugo, Docusaurus, Jekyll 		Advanced
Databases :
SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MySQL, NoSQL (Redis, Mongo) 		Expert
Development Methodologies :
SCRUM, Kanban, Atlassian Suite, TDD, ICONIX 		Advanced
Reporters:
Jasper Report, Telerik Report, Crystal Reports 		Expert
MATH & EDUCATION SKILLS
Skill Level
Mathematics :
Probability & Statistics, Linear Algebra, Diferential Calculus, Discrete Math, Latex/Katex, Geogebra, Desmos, Scipy, SymPy, Octave		 Advanced
Education:
STEAM, Alternative Education, ELearning LMS (Canvas LMS, Moodle)		 Advanced
